Different Crime.Crime Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
legal_basis: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 20(1)b)
procedural_fairness: Judicial review analyzed each case individually, considering legal principles and factual distinctions.
evidence_assessment: Applicants' ties to Philippines (family, employment, financial status) were assessed. Some lacked credible employment evidence or had weak economic ties.
decision_outcome: Judicial review granted for two cases due to unreasonable decisions; dismissed for three others as decisions were within reason.
immigration_status: Visa Officers doubted applicants' intentions to return to Philippines based on weak ties.
